meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Sansevieria, typically known as snake plants or mother-in-law's tongue.
meanings.sent1: The sansevieria in the corner of the room adds a touch of green to the space.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new sansevieria for my office desk to brighten up the area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the sansevieria was a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: The sansevieria stood tall and proud, resembling a soldier on duty.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the sansevieria swayed gently in the breeze.
